data.Caption: When worst comes to worst, squad comes first.
You simply cannot do epic things with boring people.
Friends that travel together stay together.
Squad means family and family means nobody gets left behind.
Good Times + Crazy Friends = Great Memories!
There is nothing better than a good friend, except for a good friend with chocolate.
Beer is better when you drink together.
The best beers are the ones we drink with friends.
Hard times will always reveal true friends.
Friends till the end!
True friends never apart. Maybe in distance, but never in heart.
Real men don’t take selfies.
There are big ships and small ships. But the best ship is FRIENDSHIP!
All the best people are crazy.
